name: Yubidere
description:
Yubidere is a parody of classical dating sims and harem animes playing with their tropes in an awkwardly creepy way.

In times of Corona, where we have to practice social distancing, having good friends with you is key to survive the mental pressure. This is the story of someone who didn't have any friends but created their own romantic adventures with the tools they had at hand.
